meta.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 30
meta.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the fourth week of July 2021

pageProps.content:
• Found a good article explaining GPU architecures.
  • Found a great article for planning and estimating large scale software projects.
  • Found an article on mastering the basics of icon design.
  • Framework laptop: A thin, lightweight, high-performance 13.5‚Äù notebook that can be upgraded, customized, and repaired in ways that no other notebook can.
  • Found a cool artist - Roman Trystram. Really impressed by his style.
  • Intrinsic is a new Alphabet comapany.
  • China unveiled a sweeping overhaul of its $100 billion education tech sector, banning companies that teach the school curriculum from making profits, raising capital or going public.
